songs.lyrics:
[Verse 1: Badshah]
Ik kone mein tha baitha
Jab mujhe woh dikhi thi
Woh sab se alag thi
Woh sab se haseen
Aankhen meri phir uski aankho se ja mili
Ik wari do wari phir nikli hasi
Ik hath hawa vich duje 'ch glass
Te mainu ni pata si glass 'ch ki
But hauli-hauli lak nu ghumake nachdi
Lage so sexy
O takdi mainu main takda ohnu
Mahaul mein tension badhne lagi
Khuda ki kasam na kabhi maine pi
Haan phir bhi thodi-thodi chadne lagi
Ruka na gaya main gaya ohde kol
I said I wanna talk
O kehndi mainu bol
Main ohde nehde jaa ke ohnu pucheya
Baby do you freak like you dance?
'Cause you dance like a pro

[Drop & Hook : Badshah]
Have Mercy on me
Have Mercy on me

[Verse 2: Badshah]
Jaise hilti hai waise mat hila kar
Lage mujhe rahegi Rabb se mila kar
Body teri hotter than Chinchilla fur
Teri maa ne tujhe bada kiya kya khila kar
Ruk jaaye dil when you get down low
Karlo reham thoda meri maan lo
Aise meri jaan naa meri jaan lo
Aise meri jaan na ameri jaan lo
Dhoonda but koi naa nikli kami
Pairon ke niche se nikli zameen
Band bhi karo ab karnaa yun tease
Hathon ko jod ke kehta hoon please

[Drop & Hook: Badshah]
Have mercy on me
Have mercy on me

[Outro: Badshah]
Karlo reham thoda karlo reham
Karlo reham thoda karlo reham
Karlo reham thoda karlo reham
Karlo reham thoda karlo reham
Karlo reham thoda karlo reham
Karlo reham thoda karlo reham
Karlo reham thoda karlo reham
Karlo reham thoda karlo...

[Drop and Tag: Badshah]
It's your boy Badshah!
songs.title: MERCY
